description:
The night of New Years Eve, Haruka and Yuu have a silly conversation over the phone. Yuu says "I have to go eat New Year`s soba with my family" and tries to hang up, but Haruka doesn`t want her to and says, "You`re the one I want to give my first New Year`s greeting to!"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nenmatsu Debut no S.B.J.K / Zoku Suppai Daisakusen!?
The Year-End Debut of SBJK / Sequel: A Sour Mission?!
年末デビューのS・B・J・K / 続・すっぱい大作戦!?
